short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mynotes is a sleek and user-friendly notepad extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly create, edit, organize, and save notes directly in your browser with Mynotes, a minimalist notepad extension.

Boost your productivity by adding Mynotes to your browser for instant access to your thoughts, to-do lists, and ideas—all in one place.

Quick access to note-taking features, including:
- Create, edit, delete notes
- Search notes with an integrated Font Awesome search icon
- Separate title and body fields with helpful placeholders
- Real-time note count
- Download notes as .txt files
- Print notes directly from the extension
- Automatic saving to local storage

How to use Mynotes:
- Install the extension
- Click “New Note” to start writing
- Organize notes with titles that appear in a sidebar
- Easily search, download, and print notes

Mynotes is your go-to tool for organized, efficient, and stylish note-taking in Chrome. - Developed by Kyro Creators for a seamless experience.
